title: Man dies after getting into trouble at Glynneath waterfall
article: A man has died after getting in to difficulty at a waterfall in south Wales. The 28-year-old, from Hampshire, was in the water at Pontneddfechan, Glynneath, which is also known as Pontneathvaughan. Emergency services were called to the scene at about 13:20 BST on Monday, but he died at the scene. Dyfed-Powys Police said the man's family have been informed, as has the coroner.
